description: Valid Passenger List with Adults, Children, Youth, and Infants
test_steps: Create a PaxList with at least one adult, one child, one youth, and one infant.
Verify each <Pax> has a valid <PTC> value (ADT, CHD, GBE, INF).
expected_result: Success: Passenger list is successfully processed with all passenger types.

description: Valid Passenger List with Multiple Infants per Adult
test_steps: Create a PaxList with an adult and two infants.
Verify that the infant <Pax> elements are associated with the adult <Pax> element.
expected_result: Success: Passenger list is successfully processed with multiple infants per adult.

test_steps: Create a PaxList with a <Pax> element missing a <PaxID> attribute.
expected_result: Error: Validation error due to missing <PaxID> attribute.

description: Invalid Passenger List: Invalid PTC Code
test_steps: Create a PaxList with a <Pax> element containing an invalid PTC code (e.g., 'XYZ').
expected_result: Error: Validation error due to invalid PTC code.

test_steps: Create a PaxList with two <Pax> elements sharing the same <PaxID>.
expected_result: Error: Validation error due to duplicate <PaxID>.

test_steps: Create a PaxList containing only children, youth, and infants.
expected_result: Error: Booking requires at least one adult.
